snippet: Speaking with reporters for the first time since June, Johnson said he still had a lot of confidence in Smith at quarterback despite the Jets’ 1-3 start.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Jets owner Woody Johnson criticizes team's poor early-season performance but expresses support for embattled quarterback Geno Smith; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Speaking with reporters for the first time since June, Johnson said he still had a lot of confidence in Smith at quarterback despite the Jets’ 1-3 start.

headline.main: Jets Owner Woody Johnson Still in Geno Smith’s Corner
